Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public final class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a game player. It contains all necessary resources for a player (deck, hand, grave, etc.). There are also interaction methods that allocates between resources.

    One game should have and only have 2 player instances.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Player.RoundOrder
      This enum contains all possible round order values

      • Player

        Player(java.lang.String leader_kind,
       Player.RoundOrder roundOdr)
        The constructor initializes all resources and attributes.
        Parameters:

        roundOdr - the round order of this player

    • Method Detail

      • drawCards

        public boolean drawCards(int numOfCards)
        Draw a certain amount of cards. If there is no card left in deck, the player will lose the game.
        Parameters:
        numOfCards - the number of cards to be drawn
        Returns:
        true if the card is successfully drawn, false if there is no card left in deck

      • endRound

        public void endRound()
        End current round. It resets used card count and reset all player's attack status to AttackStatus.ATTACKED

      • evolve

        public boolean evolve(Follower follower)
        Evolve a specified follower. Evolve points will be needed and only one evolution is allowed per round.
        Parameters:
        follower - the follower to be evolved
        Returns:
        true if the evolution is successful, false otherwise

      • getCostLeft

        public int getCostLeft()
        Returns:
        this player's current usable cost left

      • getDeck

        public Deck getDeck()
        Returns:
        this player's deck instance

      • getEvolvePts

        public int getEvolvePts()
        Returns:
        the number of evolve points left

      • getField

        public Field getField()
        Returns:
        this player's field instance

        public Grave getGrave()
        Returns:
        this player's grave instance

        public Hand getHand()
        Returns:
        this player's deck instance

      • getLeader

        public Leader getLeader()
        Returns:
        this player's leader instance

      • getMaxCost

        public int getMaxCost()
        Returns:
        this player's current maximum cost (maximum cost usable this round, not maximum cost overall)

      • getRoundNumber

        public int getRoundNumber()
        Returns:
        the round past since the beginning of the game

      • getRoundOrder

        public Player.RoundOrder getRoundOrder()
        Returns:
        player's round order

      • getUsedCardCount

        public int getUsedCardCount()
        Returns:
        the number of cards played this round

      • hasEvolved

        public boolean hasEvolved()
        Returns:
        true if the player has evolved this round already, false otherwise

      • increaseMaxCost

        public void increaseMaxCost()
        Increase the maximum cost available by 1 unless it hits the MAX_COST_POSSIBLE

      • iniNewRound

        public boolean iniNewRound()
        Initializes a new round. It increases round number and maximum cost, reset usable cost and evolve status and grant all followers on field with Follower.SimpleEffects.STORM effect. Finally, the player will draw a card from the deck and the round begins (draw 1 more if the player has a round order of Player.RoundOrder.DEFENSIVE and current round is the first round)
        Returns:
        true if the round has initialized successfully, false if there is no card left in deck and the game will end.

      • isOverflow

        public boolean isOverflow()
        This method checks for special leader status for Leader.LeaderType.DRAGONCRAFT
        Returns:
        true if the leader is under OVERFLOW status
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the leader is not type Leader.LeaderType.DRAGONCRAFT

      • isVengeance

        public boolean isVengeance()
        This method checks for special leader status for Leader.LeaderType.BLOODCRAFT
        Returns:
        true if the leader is under VENGEANCE status
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the leader is not type Leader.LeaderType.BLOODCRAFT

      • useCard

        public void useCard(Card card)
        Use a card in hand
        Parameters:
        card - the card to be used. It must be present in hand.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the card given does not exist in hand

      • useCost

        public void useCost(int usage)
        Use a certain amount of cost. The usage must be less than or equal to current cost left.
        Parameters:
        usage - the amount of cost to be used
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is not enough cost left
